const func = function(m, n) {\r\n        if (m === 1 && n === 1) return 1\r\n        if (m === 0 || n === 0) return 0\r\n        \r\n        const key1 = `${m},${n}`\r\n        const key2 = `${n},${m}`\r\n        \r\n        if (key1 in cache || key2 in cache) {\r\n            result = cache[key1]\r\n        } else {\r\n            result= func(m-1, n) + func(m, n-1)\r\n            cache[key1] = result\r\n            cache[key2] = result\r\n        }\r\n        \r\n        return result\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    return
